00016 #define LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM                        256
00017 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM                        256
00018 
00020 #define LOWRES_ATLAS_STRIDE                     ( 4 * LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM )
00021 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_STRIDE                     ( 4 * DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM )
00022 
00024 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_BLOCK_DIM          32
00025 
00027 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM_IN_BLOCKS      ( DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM / DETAIL_ATLAS_BLOCK_DIM )
00028 
00031 #define LOWRES_MIP                                      5
00032 
00034 #define BLUE( pel )                                     pel[ 0 ]
00035 #define GREEN( pel )                            pel[ 1 ]
00036 #define RED( pel )                                      pel[ 2 ]
00037 #define ALPHA( pel )                            pel[ 3 ]
00038 
00039 #define BLUE_SHIFT( v )                         ( ( unsigned int )( v ) )
00040 #define GREEN_SHIFT( v )                        ( ( unsigned int )( v ) <<  8 )
00041 #define RED_SHIFT( v )                          ( ( unsigned int )( v ) << 16 )
00042 #define ALPHA_SHIFT( v )                        ( ( unsigned int )( v ) << 24 )
00043 
00044 unsigned int SignedShiftRight( unsigned int value, int shift )
00045 {
00047         int right = ( shift > 0 );
00048         int left = 1 - right;
00049 
00052         return ( right * ( value >> shift ) + left * ( value << shift ) );
00053 }

00064 GrUberTileAtlas::GrUberTileAtlas()
00065 : lowResStore( 0 )
00066 , detailStore( 0 )
00067 , detailFree( 0 )
00068 {
00070         lowResStore = new unsigned char[ LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM * LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM * 4 ];
00071         detailStore = new unsigned char[ DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM * DETAIL_ATLAS_DIM * 4 ];
00072 }
00073 
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------
00075 GrUberTileAtlas::~GrUberTileAtlas()
00076 {
00077         delete[] lowResStore;
00078         delete[] detailStore;
00079 }

00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void
00088 GrUberTileAtlas::Clear()
00089 {
00091         unsigned int clearValue = 0;
00092         unsigned int lowResMemSize = LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM * LOWRES_ATLAS_DIM;
00093         MemSet( lowResStore, 0, lowResMemSize );
00094 
00096         detailFree = 0;
00097 }

00099 //----------------------------------------------------------
00100 unsigned int
00101 GrUberTileAtlas::AddGroup( unsigned int mip, unsigned int minX, unsigned int minY,
00102                                                    unsigned int maxX, unsigned int maxY )
00103 {
00105         unsigned int groupWidth = maxX - minX + 1;
00106         unsigned int groupHeight = maxY - minY + 1;
00107 
00109         B_ASSERT( groupWidth < DETAIL_ATLAS_BLOCK_DIM );
00110         B_ASSERT( groupHeight < DETAIL_ATLAS_BLOCK_DIM );
00111 
00114         int shift = ( LOWRES_MIP - ( int )mip );
00115         unsigned int lowresStartX = SignedShiftRight( minX, shift );
00116         unsigned int lowresStartY = SignedShiftRight( minY, shift );
00117         unsigned int lowresEndX = lowresStartX + SignedShiftRight( groupWidth, shift );
00118         unsigned int lowresEndY = lowresStartY + SignedShiftRight( groupWidth, shift );
00119 
00121         unsigned char mipScale = ( unsigned char )( 128 >> mip );
00122 
00125         if ( mip < LOWRES_MIP )
00126         {
00128                 for ( unsigned int lowY = lowresStartY; lowY < lowresEndY; ++lowY )
00129                 {
00130                         for ( unsigned int lowX = lowresStartX; lowX < lowresEndX; ++lowX )
00131                         {
00134                                 
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         else
00139         {
00141                 unsigned char* lowResPel = lowResStore + lowresStartY * DETAIL_ATLAS_STRIDE;
00142                 for ( unsigned int lowY = lowresStartY; lowY < lowresEndY; ++lowY, lowResPel += DETAIL_ATLAS_STRIDE )
00143                 {
00144                         unsigned char* curLowResScan = lowResPel;
00145                         for ( unsigned int lowX = lowresStartX; lowX < lowresEndX; ++lowX, curLowResScan += 4 )
00146                         {
00149 
00153                                 if ( ALPHA( curLowResScan ) == 255 )
00154                                 {
00156                                         
00157                                 }
00158                                 else
00159                                 {
00163                                         if ( mipScale > RED( curLowResScan ) )
00164                                         {
00166                                                 RED( curLowResScan ) = mipScale;
00167 
00169                                         }
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00176         return 0;
00177 }

00210 /*
00211         Mip scale calculation notes.
00212 
00213         2   =  1:1              (2048:2048), shift = 6
00214         4   =  2:1              (2048:4096), shift = 5
00215         8   =  4:1              (2048:8192), shift = 4
00216         16  =  8:1              (2048:16384), shift = 3
00217         32  = 16:1              (2048:32768), shift = 2
00218         64  = 32:1              (2048:65536), shift = 1
00219         128 = 64:1              (2048:131072), shift = 0
00220 
00221         mipValue, valueWritten.
00222         0 = 128
00223         1 = 64
00224         2 = 32
00225         3 = 16
00226         4 = 8
00227         5 = 4
00228         6 = 2
00230 */
00231
